name: MEME LTD
description: MEME20 is a tokenized derivative of the Meme LTD NFT Collection. It enables anyone to trade NFTs from the collection in a permissionless way with instant liquidity on https://nft20.io/ routed via UniSwap. Every 100 MEME20 tokens represent an underlying NFT, minted upon deposit into the pool on https://nft20.io/ and burned upon withdrawal from the pool.
